message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"measure word for parts or portions","sentence":"请给我三分。","image_prompt":"A young woman in a soft apocalypse animation style is sitting at a simple table, dividing a round cake into three equal pieces. On the table are three distinct portions. The setting is minimalist, colors are muted with hints of urban decay outside the window. The mood is calm and thoughtful.","sentence_translation":"Please give me three portions."}
